member.name: WICPngChrmProperties
member.summary: Specifies the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) cHRM chunk metadata properties for CIE XYZ chromaticity.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmWhitePointX
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the whitepoint x value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmWhitePointY
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the whitepoint y value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmRedX
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the red x value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmRedY
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the red y value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmGreenX
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the green x value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmGreenY
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the green y value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmBlueX
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the blue x value ratio.

member.name: WICPngChrmProperties.WICPngChrmBlueY
member.summary: [VT_UI4] Indicates the blue y value ratio.
